q: Eric Schmidt , who oversaw Google's meteoric rise, told the DLD media conference in Munich on Tuesday. He told Reuters on January 21 that his move was an effort to speed up decision-making. In strategy we agree. There's no disagreement, Eric Schmidt said of his relationship with Page, in a news conference following his DLD appearance. friend of Democratic congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords , has visited the lawmaker in her hospital room and is in close contact with her astronaut husband Mark Kelly, she told NBC's "Meet The Press." Gabrielle Giffords is making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand said. "It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury," she added. The 40-year-old Gabrielle Giffords has survived despite being shot through the head

Player for nearly 20 minutes, using his quickness to prevent Allen Iverson from even getting the ball, let alone shoot it. I just try to deny him the ball as much as possible, because when he does get the ball, the best penetrator in the game is going to be hard to stop, Tyronn Lue said. Indeed, the state statute does not prevent Mike Pence from participating in party activities conducted by a regular party committee.
